otherProjects.name: Lukaloka mobile app
otherProjects.description: Mobile App for the web application Lukaloka. A small online marketplace mainly for oversea vietnamese people. A place for buyers and sellers to come together and trade almost anything that you want to.

otherProjects.name: Furniture App
otherProjects.description: A small online furniture shop, where user can order and manage their products. This app was implemented from sratch with react native

otherProjects.name: Travel app
otherProjects.description: A mobile app to add favorite places. This is app was made in order to get familiar with ionic framework

otherProjects.name: Saigon
otherProjects.description: Landing page for the restaurant Saigon in Kaiserlautern, Germany.

otherProjects.name: Pizza Restaurant
otherProjects.description: A HTMl/CSS Template for a landing page of a pizza restaurant. This was made for a customer in Frankfurt, Germany.

otherProjects.name: Face Recognition
otherProjects.description: A web app to recognize japanes actress. User send the app an image and this app will recognize and give the user actree's information
